fig.title: Saxon HE/PE/EE XQuery Advanced Preferences Panel
Saxon HE/PE/EE XQuery Advanced Preferences Panel

body.p: The advanced XQuery options that can be configured for the Saxon XQuery transformer (all editions: Home Edition, Professional Edition, Enterprise Edition) are as follows:

ul.li: URI Resolver class name - Allows you to specify a custom implementation for the URI resolver used by the XQuery Saxon transformer (the -r option when run from the command line). The class name must be fully specified and the corresponding jar or class extension must be configured from the dialog box for configuring the XQuery extension for the particular transformation scenario.If your URIResolver implementation does not recognize the given resource, the resolve(String href, String base) method should return a null value. Otherwise, the given resource will not be resolved through the XML Catalog.

Collection URI Resolver class name - Allows you to specify a custom implementation for the Collection URI resolver used by the XQuery Saxon transformer (the -cr option when run from the command line). The class name must be fully specified and the corresponding jar or class extension must be configured from the dialog box for configuring the XQuery extension for the particular transformation scenario.
